comp5134.pos.domain

Class Flavors

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp5134.pos.domain.Products
      • comp5134.pos.domain.Flavors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProductInterface

    public final class Flavors
extends Products
implements ProductInterface
    This class is used to create a new instance of ice-cream flavor. Must be implemented "checkOverLimit" which is used to check the user selected count.
    Author:
    Raymond Kwan
    See Also:
    is the child class of Product

        public boolean checkOverLimit(int checkValue)
        This function is used to check the select flavor item(s) whether over the defined limit at SystemSetting.java
        Specified by:
        checkOverLimit in interface ProductInterface
        Parameters:
        checkValue - an integer; -1 means infinite
        Returns:
        true if over limit ; false if not over limit
        Throws:
        will - be return true if there is any exception
